name: env-schema
description: Validate your env variable using Ajv and dotenv

scripts.test: standard | snazzy && tap test/*.test.js --no-check-coverage && npm run typescript
scripts.test:ci: standard | snazzy && tap test/*.test.js --no-check-coverage --coverage-report=lcovonly && npm run typescript

author: Matteo Collina <hello@matteocollina.com>
